name: Paint the World (itch)
description:
The world has gradually lost its ability to believe. As a result, color itself has washed away from the world. But one girl knows color is the first step to bringing hope back, so she decides to embark on her journey to paint the world...

GOAL: Paint 60% of the stage to open the way out. New colors will allow you to discover new areas!

CONTROLS:

  • WASD/Arrows to move, Space to jump
  • J/L to cycle colors
  • K to toggle selected color (and disable/enable colored walls)
